inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: Name of .app
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the .app, which is sometimes different from the .ipa

inputs.name: sdk
inputs.label: SDK
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the specified SDK.  Run **xcodebuild -showsdks** to see the valid list of SDKs.

inputs.name: exportOptionsPlist
inputs.label: Export Options plist
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates the options plist file that specifies the export options. If not specified, the archive will default to using "-exportFormat ipa"

inputs.name: shouldSkipSignArchive
inputs.label: Skip Archive Signing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Checking this box will skip all attempts to sign the archive

inputs.name: provisioningProfile
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the provisioning profile to use when signing.

inputs.name: signingIdentity
inputs.label: Signing Identity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional specification for the identity to sign the archive with

inputs.name: appPath
inputs.label: Path to .app
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the built .app file

inputs.name: ipaName
inputs.label: Name of .ipa
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name to give the IPA (if different from appname.ipa)

inputs.name: ipaPath
inputs.label: Path to place .ipa
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path where the .ipa will be placed. The directory will be created if it doesn't exist.

inputs.name: otherArgs
inputs.label: Other Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Other arguments. The value here will be passed directly to the commandline call to xcodebuild
